comments.body: 1 hash mark = 1 card available ALL available for sale! Not too set on pricing yet, but heavy discounts given to bulk buyers! Amethyst and Ruby will be priced to move, especially if other cards are bought with it.

comments.body: Quote from: Cryptogreatdane on August 13, 2022, 01:49:33 AMWow first time seeing the MR3.. pretty cool.. i also like the MR2 Doge. I forsee buying more boxes in my future. Still need a redemption card.If you have enough spare $ then buy a case while still avaialble, guaranteed redemption card and probably a few other nice hits.I am still waiting on my first order to arrive, international shipping ordered on 27/7/22 and it still hasn't left the US, hoping for delivery next week If anyone has a MR gemstone reflector for sale, preferably ruby or above, please let me know [moderator's note: consecutive posts merged]
